name: Growing Piphilipe
description:
Take care of a little spooky pet

Keep Piphilipe happy and not hungry to prevent it from getting angry and turning into an "horrible" virtual monster.

Food Bag
Feed Piphilipe with all sorts of nutritious food until it's full and happy!
Eating will certainly get him messy though...

Hygiene Case
Make sure to clean and groom Piphilipe until it looks its best!
Take care, as too much brushing and bubbles will make Philippe antsy to play.

Toy Box
Enjoy your time with Piphilipe or punish it when its not behaving!
And remember, nothing beats a  good meal after playtime.

Developers clue: The Hammers reset the Pet if it starts not to work.
